posts.description: Web publishers face a quandary in 2014: User expectations for how quickly a website will load are getting faster and faster. But web pages keep getting fatter and fatter, adding custom fonts, bigger art, more video, and more complex JavaScript into the mix. Our 3G reality often falls short of our b…

posts.message:
This open source interactive C# editor/shell (REPL) was built by a hedge fund. I've never seen this before, a quant hedge fund releasing open source software :)
http://cshell.net/
